name: Pear Cranberry Scones
author: Silk
summary: Chopped fresh pears, dried cranberries, and orange zest make delicious scones for breakfast, brunch, or tea time.
ingredients: 1 cup Silk® Coconutmilk, any flavor except chocolate
3 tablespoons fresh orange juice, or more as needed
directions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or coat with cooking spray
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and baking soda
In a separate bowl, whisk together Silk, orange juice, cranberries, orange zest and canola oil
Pour the wet mixture into the dry and mix together with a wooden spoon, stirring with as few strokes as possible
Use an ice cream scoop or large spoon to drop the batter onto prepared baking sheets, forming 12 scones
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until tops are lightly browned
For the glaze, whisk all ingredients together until smooth and creamy
